posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a Tim Jordan Portrait in vg to ex condition. Raw or graded, just prefer that the card is centered and doesn't creases or wrinkles.

Thanks!

Was gonna put this on BST in the next few days for $35 delivered. Saw your post, so figured I would see if you were interested.

Spec of a wrinkle visible under magnification starting below his left eye and ending in the blue background just above his left collar not visible on the back.

Hey David,

Thanks for reaching out. Yeah I think because of the wrinkle and corner ding it would probably come out a good 2 and I'm shooting for VG to VGEX for my portrait collection. So I have to decline, but thanks again for reaching out. Otherwise it's a great looking card.
